channel.title: CVE Feed for Marco Gasi -- Language Switcher for Transposh
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Marco Gasi -- Language Switcher for Transposh

item.title: CVE-2024-32695|2024-04-22T07:49:43.101Z -- Marco Gasi -- Language Switcher for Transposh
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Marco Gasi Language Switcher for Transposh allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Language Switcher for Transposh: from n/a through 1.5.9.
